comment.author: 34918130@N07
comment._content: Interesting and I Learn something new everyday.   Looking in the Background , I think there is a Windmill ???    Never knew Sweden had Windmill's.

comment.author: 34419668@N08
comment._content:
granniscreek1: It's certainly a windmill you see in the background. Sweden was full of them in the old times, and some were even still in use in the first decades of the 20th century. 

Many windmills have been preserved and are considered an important part of the landscape - very much so in the province of Öland where this photo is taken.   

/Anna B.
